author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KRISTY MOVING WESTWARD AS A VERY POWERFUL CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE...
summary:
...KRISTY MOVING WESTWARD AS A VERY POWERFUL CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE...
 As of 2:00 AM PDT Thu Oct 24
 the center of Kristy was located near 14.1, -118.9
 with movement W at 17 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 933 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.
